More Planets 2.1.3 Change Log
+ Added Slab to Block recipes

* Prevent Milk from cure capsule effect

* Optimize JEI recipes 
* Improved Black Hole Storage schematic 
* Fixed Grass color in space biomes 
* Fixed Black Hole not spawning falling block

* Fixed invisible item models (Forge build 2725)
